layers.name: text
layers.text:
Neelu the butterfly was scolding her son Katty, the caterpillar, "Why did you eat all the leaves of the plants? Why do you overeat? The gardener is angry. He is looking for you. Why? don't yath'ever use your brain?
"What can I do mother? My brain is in my tummy, so I do what my tummy tells me to do," replied Katty.

layers.name: text
layers.text: "Dont give me excuses. Just stay here. Let me go and see where that angry gardener is. Sit here quietly till I come back," said Neelu, and flew away.

layers.name: text
layers.text: Katty. the caterpillar huffed and puffed while crawling because he had overeaten. He felt tired, so he rested on the leaves of the plant.

layers.name: text
layers.text:
Katty  the caterpillar quietly sat on a leaf. But soon he felt hungry. I will go back to the garden and eat some more leaves. I shall come back before mother comes,'  thought the hungry caterpillar,
and left for the garden.

layers.name: text
layers.text: The gardener who had been searching for him caught him there. "You greedy caterpillar, how dare you eat the leaves of my plants! I shall not leave you," shouted the gardener.

layers.name: text
layers.text: Katty started crying and called out, "Mom! Where are you? Please help me!" Neelu, the butterfly heard Katty's voice and came flying to him. The butterfly politely requested the gardener to free the caterpillar.

layers.name: text
layers.text: Tears were rolling down Katty's face. Seeing this, the gardener's heart melted. He told the caterpillar to be careful next time. Neelu thanked the gardener. Katty quickly got off the plant and went away with his mother. He promised her that he would not be greedy in future.
